00079 void service_coherence_msg(struct cache_t * const cp, unsigned long long int address, enum cache_command cmd)
00080 {
00081         switch(cmd)
00082         {
00083           case INVALIDATE:
00084                 break;
00085           case FWD_DIRTY:
00086                 break;
00087           case ACK:
00088                 break;
00089           default:
00090                 fatal("Invalid coherence message type received");
00091         }
00092 
00093 
00094 }
